definition: to be born/to give birth/life/to grow/raw/uncooked/student

pinyin: Shi4 jie4 Ye3 sheng1 Sheng1 wu4 Ji1 jin1 hui4

definition: Convention on International Trade in Endangered Species of Wild Fauna and Flora/CITES
pinyin: Bin1 wei1 Ye3 sheng1 Dong4 Zhi2 wu4 zhong3 Guo2 ji4 Mao4 yi4 Gong1 yue1
containing_words.word: 瀕危野生動植物種國際貿易公約

pinyin: ye3 sheng1 dong4 zhi2 wu4 yuan2
Ye3 sheng1 Sheng1 wu4 Ji1 jin1 hui4

sentences.english: Wild-simulated ginseng is planted in the fall.
sentences.chinese: 模擬野生養殖的高麗蔘在夏天種植。

sentences.english: The buttercup is a wild plant with bright yellow cup - shaped flowers.
sentences.chinese: 毛茛是一種野生植物，開杯形黃色花。

sentences.english: This paper deals with the floristic statistics, analysis of the 418 species on wild ligneous plants.
sentences.chinese: 本文對418種野生木本植物進行了區系統計和分析。

sentences.english: The countryside abounds in wild life of every kind.
sentences.chinese: 鄉間繁生各種野生生物。

sentences.english: Do not feed macaques and wild animals.
sentences.chinese: 請勿餵食獼猴及其它野生動物。

sentences.english: Female tigers in the wild can live up to 15 years averagely.
sentences.chinese: 野生雌虎的壽命大約是15年，平均能產下5窩虎仔。

sentences.english: Studies on the Taxonomy of the Strawberry(Fragaria)Species Distributed in China;
sentences.chinese: 中國是世界上野生草莓種類最豐富的國家。

sentences.english: When you do, be prepared for some intensive wildlife bingo.
sentences.chinese: 如果你來這裏旅行，請注意野生動物密集的區域。

sentences.english: The northern Duars has dense vegetation and abundant wildlife.
sentences.chinese: 北部Duars有濃密的植被和豐富的野生動植物。

sentences.english: Objective To study the total polyphenols extracted condition from wild grape.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究野生山葡萄總多酚的浸提條件。

sentences.english: It has transparent cover which allows the kids to see the sea wild life.
sentences.chinese: 它有透明蓋，讓孩子們看海野生動物。

sentences.english: Eating wild animal, to maintain ecological balance.
sentences.chinese: 拒食野生動物，維護生態平衡。

sentences.english: Some-times he'd go wild and get locked up for a few hours .
sentences.chinese: 有時他會去野生並鎖定了幾個小時。

sentences.english: Pine mushroom is a local delicacy in Hunan province of China.
sentences.chinese: 湖南的松菌是深受當地羣衆歡迎的一種野生食用菌。

sentences.english: You can just imagine how fierce the wild animals can be.
sentences.chinese: 你可以想象一下野生動物是多麼的兇猛。

sentences.english: Most have been bred from one, or just a few, wild-caught individuals.
sentences.chinese: 大多數的好球是一隻或幾隻野生球蟒生育而來的。

definition: to release (an animal) into the wild
game/wild animals and birds hunted for food or sport
